cause.description:
We strive to raise awareness about positive self-esteem and body image through promoting healthy living, physical exercise, self-development and nutrition.
Visit our website at http://www.redefinemovement.com
Former name: The True Beauty Campaign/The Reflections Campaign for True Beauty
Join our Facebook group at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=23415374200
1. YOU are worth so much more than you think!
2. Proper nutrition and healthy living is essential to a person's well-being.
3. Negative body image is greatly affecting the self-esteem and self-worth of men and women today.
4. The beginning of social change requires a defiance towards norms - we must not give into the negative voices around us!
cause.mission: The RE!define Movement is a youth-led effort to redefine beauty as seen in society. Through education, advocacy and health promotion, the RE!define Movement urges a rewrite to the definition of beauty
cause.name: The RE!define Movement - [let's RE!define beauty on our own terms!]
